mysteryDungeon:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
mysteryDungeon:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

mysteryDungeon:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
mysteryDungeon:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
mysteryDungeon:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

mysteryDungeon:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
mysteryDungeon:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

mysteryDungeon:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
mysteryDungeon:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage [E] times. NL (Deal !mysteryDungeon:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

mysteryDungeon:DefaultSecondMagicNumberS.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
mysteryDungeon:DefaultSecondMagicNumberS.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and !mysteryDungeon:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.

mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurGrowl.NAME: Growl
mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurGrowl.DESCRIPTION: Growls cutely to reduce the foe's Attack. NL Applies !M! Weak to ALL enemies.

mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurLeechSeed.NAME: Leech Seed
mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurLeechSeed.DESCRIPTION: Plants a seed on the foe to steal HP on every turn. NL Apply !M! Leech Seed. NL Exhaust.
mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurLeechSeed.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Plants a seed on the foe to steal HP on every turn. NL Apply !M! Leech Seed.

mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurParalysisPowder.NAME: Paralysis Powder
mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurParalysisPowder.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Apply !M! Slow. NL Exhaust.

mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurPoisonJab.NAME: Poison Jab
mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurPoisonJab.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage 2 times. NL Apply !M! Poison 2 times.

mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurPoisonPowder.NAME: Poison Powder
mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurPoisonPowder.DESCRIPTION: Scatters a toxic powder that may poison the foe. NL Apply !M! Poison to ALL enemies.

mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurRazorLeaf.NAME: Razor Leaf
mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurRazorLeaf.DESCRIPTION: Cuts the enemy with leaves. NL Removes all block from the enemy. NL Deals !D! damage.

mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurRest.NAME: Rest
mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurRest.DESCRIPTION: Heal ALL HP. Rest for !M! turns.

mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurSleepPowder.NAME: Sleep Powder
mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurSleepPowder.DESCRIPTION: Scatters a powder that may cause the foe to sleep. NL Apply !M! Sleep.

mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurSolarBeam.NAME: Solar Beam
mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurSolarBeam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Draw !M! less cards during your next turn.

mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurSunnyDay.NAME: Sunny Day
mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurSunnyDay.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, NL Draw one more card and Reduce by 1 the cost of the card NL with the highest cost in your hand.

mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurSweetScent.NAME: Sweet Scent
mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurSweetScent.DESCRIPTION: Allures the foe to reduce evasiveness. NL Apply !M! Frail. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable

mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurTackle.NAME: Tackle
mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurTackle.DESCRIPTION: Charges the foe with a full-body tackle. NL Deals !D! damage.

mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurVineWhip.NAME: Vine Whip
mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurVineWhip.DESCRIPTION: Strikes the foe with slender, whiplike vines. NL Deals !D! damage.
